content: the scoreboard 1 cowl is worked in the two or three colors of your favorite football team the idea is simple - knit the points as they are scored in each game knit the long and proud original version or scoreboard 2 0 a shorter version that still keeps you in all the action when the season is over you will be left with an amazing wearable knitted record of your team s season in the scoreboard cowl go to scoreboard for details and a complete supply list 1 https //www skacelknitting com/scoreboard
